creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
JMeter currently supports Jexl 1.1.
This is used by the __jexl() function and the BSF test elements.

It would be useful to support Jexl 2 as a function - the scripting is much improved over Jexl 1.

Still need to keep Jexl 1 for BSF and existing __jexl code.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
URL: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=1182604&view=rev
Log:
Bug 52016 - It would be useful to support Jexl2
